author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Use GeantUnits instead of CLHEP

_Note_: This PR is based on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27383

title: Ecal Geometry: Algorithms Migration from CLHEP to GeantUnits
